p: Our study was carried out in Kisantu and Mbanza-Ngungu towns as well as in the rural villages surrounding Mbanza-Ngungu, in Kongo-Central Province, Democratic Republic of Congo. Kisantu (also called Inkisi) is located at latitude 5° 08′ S and at longitude 15° 03′ E. Its altitude is estimated at 530 m above sea level (masl) [ 18]. Mbanza-Ngungu is located at latitude 5° 16′ S and at longitude 14° 5′ E. Its altitude ranges 500 to 750 masl [ 19]. The areas are characterized by a tropical Köppen AW 4 climate with an average annual rainfall of 900 to 1500 mm and an annual average temperature of 25 °C [ 20] (Fig. 1).
